var.name: category
var.query: SELECT CONCAT(LOWER(if(cxref1.`parent_id` != 0, CONCAT( if(cxref2.`parent_id` != 0, CONCAT( if(cxref3.`parent_id` != 0, CONCAT( if(cxref4.`parent_id` != 0, CONCAT( if(cxref5.`parent_id` != 0, CONCAT( c6.`title`,'/',c5.`title`), c5.`title`) ,'/',c4.`title`), c4.`title`) ,'/',c3.`title`), c3.`title`) ,'/',c2.`title`), c2.`title`) ,'/',c1.`title`), c1.`title`)), '') FROM `#__categories` AS `cxref1` LEFT JOIN `#__categories` AS `c1` ON c1.`id` = cxref1.`id` LEFT JOIN `#__categories` AS `cxref2` ON cxref2.`id` = cxref1.`parent_id` LEFT JOIN `#__categories` AS `c2` ON c2.`id` = cxref2.`id` LEFT JOIN `#__categories` AS `cxref3` ON cxref3.`id` = cxref2.`parent_id` LEFT JOIN `#__categories` AS `c3` ON c3.`id` = cxref3.`id` LEFT JOIN `#__categories` AS `cxref4` ON cxref4.`id` = cxref3.`parent_id` LEFT JOIN `#__categories` AS `c4` ON c4.`id` = cxref4.`id` LEFT JOIN `#__categories` AS `cxref5` ON cxref5.`id` = cxref4.`parent_id` LEFT JOIN `#__categories` AS `c5` ON c5.`id` = cxref5.`id` LEFT JOIN `#__categories` AS `cxref6` ON cxref6.`id` = cxref5.`parent_id` LEFT JOIN `#__categories` AS `c6` ON c6.`id` = cxref6.`id` WHERE cxref1.`id` = {cid}
